io.github.nucleuspowered.nucleus.api.service

Interface NucleusMuteService


  • public interface NucleusMuteService
    Provides methods for managing mutes within Nucleus

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String MUTED_CONTEXT
      The permission context key that indicates a player is muted.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the MuteInfo about a player.

      Gets whether a User is muted.

      Unmutes a player.

    • Field Detail

      • MUTED_CONTEXT

        static final java.lang.String MUTED_CONTEXT
        The permission context key that indicates a player is muted.

        The value of this context will always be true if set.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • isMuted

        boolean isMuted(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User user)
        Gets whether a User is muted.
        Parameters:
        user - The User to check.
        Returns:
        true if so.

      • getPlayerMuteInfo

        java.util.Optional<MuteInfo> getPlayerMuteInfo(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User user)
        Gets the MuteInfo about a player.
        Parameters:
        user - The User to check
        Returns:
        The MuteInfo, if applicable.

      • mutePlayer

        boolean mutePlayer(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User user,
                   java.lang.String reason,
                   @Nullable
                   java.time.Duration duration,
                   org.spongepowered.api.event.cause.Cause cause)
        Mutes a player.
        Parameters:
        user - The User to mute.
        reason - The reason to mute them for.
        duration - The length of time to mute for, or null for indefinite.
        cause - The Cause of the mute. The first User in the cause will be designated as the muter.
        Returns:
        true if the user was muted, false if the user was already muted.

      • unmutePlayer

        boolean unmutePlayer(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User user,
                     org.spongepowered.api.event.cause.Cause cause)
        Unmutes a player.
        Parameters:
        user - The User to unmute.
        cause - The Cause
        Returns:
        true if the player was unmuted.
